articles.title: Finance Bill 2026: New tax proposals spark nationwide debate
articles.description: Finance Bill 2026: New tax proposals spark nationwide debate. Finance Bill 2026 continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: Finance Bill 2026: New tax proposals spark nationwide debate. The Finance Bill 2026 has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the taxation sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
